title: Papa Troll
description: Papa Troll has a wife, and son, and daughter, and another daughter and two more sons, and a brother-in-law. They’re a family and assist each other in law.
altHero: Papa Troll with a pipe in his mouth
alt1: Papa Troll riding in a boat with the town and rainbow behind
alt2: a rat riding a bike and carrying some loot
alt3: Papa Troll and his family by the windmills
